about__content.about-content__title: I build things for the web.
about__content.about-content__text: Hello! My name is John Chavarro and I enjoy designing things that are displayed on the Internet. My interest in web development started in 2013 when I decided to try editing custom wordPress themes. Getting my ideas onto the screen is very exciting, it taught me a lot about HTML and CSS!

card__content.card-content__text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.

contact.contact__text: Although I am currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to answer you!
contact.button--contact: Let's talk! I will bring coffee
